about.concept.description: The CPPT concept is essential as a management task to drive continuous improvement throughout the organization. At GoLeanSigma we help our customers to implement this concept.
about.concept.motto: Strive for perfection to achieve excellence.
about.concept.name: The concept
about.concept.title: Customer, People, Process, Tools
about.cppt.customer.description: The CPPT concept is essential as a management task to drive continuous improvement throughout the organization. At GoLeanSigma we help our customers to implement this concept.
about.cppt.customer.name: Customers
about.cppt.customer.title: The Customer is always the focus.
about.cppt.people.description: To be successful, you need the right people with the right attitude. Strong leadership qualities of the management are crucial
about.cppt.people.name: People
about.cppt.people.title: Right People with right attitude and skillset.
about.cppt.process.description: It takes clearly defined and transparent processes to work effectively and efficiently.
about.cppt.process.name: Processes
about.cppt.process.title: Lean Processes throughout the whole organization.
about.cppt.tools.description: To improve processes along the value chain of a company, the right tools are required.
about.cppt.tools.name: Tools
about.cppt.tools.title: Right Tools to support and secure success.
about.hero.description: At GoLeanSigma, our mission is to enable our clients and their employees to drive change, reduce waste against their customers and stakeholders, and achieve greater profitability and independence for the business.
about.hero.title: Every step towards excellence
about.wwr.description: We are passionate about improving ourselves and our clients, and we believe in Lean Management and SixSigma as the most powerful mindsets and tools that can be applied anywhere, anytime, across the organization.
about.wwr.description2: We are passionate about improving ourselves and our customers every day. In doing so, we consistently follow our CPPT concept .
about.wwr.title: Who we are

faq.a.1: At GoLeanSigma, we help you implement a lean management culture in your organization to increase efficiency and profitability in all areas and become more resilient to external influences.
faq.a.3: Implementing 6S in your organization will result in a number of important benefits. Companies use the methodology to solve some of the most critical problems. Standardized management of workplaces helps achieve cost savings, increase quality in all processes, and last but not least, reduce accidents and increase safety.
faq.q.3: What is the benefit of implementing 6S?

home.benefits.6sOnTheFly.text: We provide a simple yet powerful and effective checklist for your 6S audits. Whether you use it for an office, laboratory, or production area, GoLeanSigma's 6S audit checklist is designed to work for your needs.
home.benefits.6sOnTheFly.title: 6S audits on the fly
home.benefits.generateTask.text: Use your 6S audit results to generate tasks in just a few steps. Set the task's priority level, due date, and status and you're ready to go.
home.benefits.generateTask.title: Generate tasks from your audit results
home.benefits.visualizeData.text: Track your organization's performance by generating real-time reports directly from the results of your audit.
home.benefits.visualizeData.title: Visualize your data
home.callToAction.title: See how can we help you with your business process.

home.grid.createTrasparency.text: Introduction of a holistic management and key performance indicator system as well as corporate and process audits.

home.sixS.text: Digital 6S Audit - efficient and easy-to-use app to support your 6S audits. Whether in the office, lab, production or in self-selected areas. By using the GoLeanSigma 6S Audit App, the acceptance, transparency and efficiency of the audits are significantly increased and 6S will be a method to increase your success.
